elements.caption: This Module works only with HIKVISION and ANNKE Cameras. First you need to configure Smart Events in the Camera Setup.
Please note : In your Camera configuration the System/security/Web-Authentication  needs to be set to digest/basic
Then you need to configure the Webhook call in the Camera Alarmserver (extended Network Setting)
After a HIKVISION Camera has send an Event to the Symcon  WebHook a set of variables will be created for each Camera.
The Top Level variable is the Camera Name. Below the IP-Adress, Date+Time of the Event, Password, User Name, Picture of the last Event
If your Cameras have different Passwords/User IDS`s you need to enter the correct Data into the relevant Variable
Please Note for this Module to work you need to first install the Egg Timer Module from the IP-Symcon Modul Store

elements.name: MotionActive
elements.caption: Duration the Motion Event stays activ in seconds
